title: Hoozuki no Reitetsu 2nd Season OVA
original_name: 鬼灯の冷徹 第 2 期 OAD
ending_song: "Jigoku no Sata mo Kimi Shidai (地獄の沙汰も君次第)" by Jigoku no Sata All Stars (Hiroki Yasumoto, Takashi Nagasako, Yumiko Kobayashi, Tetsuya Kakihara, Touko Aoyama, Eri Kitamura x YOUR SONG IS GOOD)
sinopse:
Bundled with the limited editions of 29th, 30th, and 31st volumes of the Hoozuki no Reitetsu manga.

OVA 3 will be streamed in advance on September 1, 2020. OVA 3 will officially be released with volume 31 of the manga on September 23 2020.
